artist: Author: Amber Gayle; Publisher: Evil Twin Publications, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle sewn binding with blue thread, a serpentine pattern printed in color offset lithgraphy, with designs, text, and an image of a see-saw relief printed onto wove paper covers; 40 pp.
medium: Relief print, color offset lithography, letterpress, decal; bound volume
title: The Twin Survey
